content: I would appreciate a review of this, I have a series of PRs which depend on it to reorganise the material in CategoryTheory/Sites/CoherentÂ and CategoryTheory/Sites/RegularExtensive. This one just puts the two files in a new subfolder. Should be easy.
The next one is #9944, it splits the two files in the new folder into six files but adds no new material.
Next up are #9976 (adding some new material) and #9979 (golfing some existing proofs)
